name: ixy.js
description: Javascript implementation of ixy, a userspace network driver

scripts.perf: npm i && node-gyp configure build && 0x -F="flamegraphs/{timestamp}.html" ixy.js
scripts.perfk: npm i && node-gyp configure build && 0x -F="flamegraphs/{timestamp}.html" --kernel-tracing ixy.js

author: Sebastian Di Luzio <sebastian.di-luzio@tum.de>
